info.name: Black styles — Mozilla – about:downloads
info.description: One style of my black styles collection. Makes inverted scheme of this sites. Used primary with my black skin for Windows. You can download it here (for Windows 7; may be work on 8 and 10, because I don't use Aero)
info.additionalInfo: Style writed only for addon S3.Download Statusbar, because it improve managing of download. If you use Firefox, you must test this addon! (if you don't like it, you can easy delete it) So this addon override about:downloads page, you can see it on screenshot (of course in my black edition).
